backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, payout methods, and withdrawal requests with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like listing of frontend file summaries describing functionality across components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/BUILD_DEPLOY_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide for building and deploying the app with steps for local and production environments plus required environment variables.
frontend/docs/betting-topup-video-checkl: Checklist documenting required UI, interactions, and validation for the betting top‑up flow implementation.
frontend/docs/crypto-wallet-dashboard-ch: Checklist covering all UI sections and behaviors for the crypto wallet dashboard, including actions and state handling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, theme variables, and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the frontend app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the app layout with authentication gating, profile-setup logic, and all TanStack Router route definitions.
frontend/src/backend-augment.d.ts: Augments the backend actor interface with an authorization initialization method for admin setup.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Provides an admin-only route wrapper that shows loading state or an access-denied message.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginCard.t: Renders the login UI using Internet Identity with branding and status messaging.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoAct: Displays a single crypto transaction row with icons, status badge, and relative timestamp.
Loads and filters local crypto transactions, displaying them in a tabbed activity list with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoDas: Shows the crypto dashboard balance header with a hide/show toggle and stylized background.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoQui: Renders quick‑action buttons for crypto operations such as send, receive, buy, swap, and bank transfer.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoTok: Lists crypto tokens with icons, balances, and click handling for selection.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Bu: UI sheet for selecting a crypto asset and USD amount to create a pending local 'buy' transaction.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Re: Sheet for selecting an asset, displaying a mock receive address, copying it, and logging a placeholder received transaction.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Se: Form for choosing an asset, destination address, and amount to create a pending local 'send' crypto transaction.
Multi-step flow for entering withdrawal amount, selecting or adding payout methods, and submitting a withdrawal request.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Sw: Sheet for swapping between two crypto assets with mock rate calculation and creation of a pending swap transaction.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Promotional dashboard card with illustration, text, and pagination dots.
Configurable dashboard shortcut button with icon, label, optional badge, and coming-soon state.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/GiftCa: Renders up to a limit of label badges and a count badge for remaining tags.
Editor for adding, removing, and saving gift card label tags with UI controls and save state.
Filter bar allowing selection and clearing of gift card labels via popover and badges.
Displays NGN rate tiers for a gift card brand in a table format.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/NGNRat: Inline summary showing matched NGN rate tier or an unavailable notice.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/Select: Bottom sheet allowing users to search and select a gift card brand using filter and list UI.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryT: Row component showing transaction icon, details, relative time, amount, and status badge.
Main app layout with sidebar, mobile header, navigation, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileBot: Mobile bottom navigation dock for quick navigation between key app routes.
frontend/src/components/payout/NigerianB: Searchable dropdown component for selecting Nigerian banks using Command and Popover UI.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for creating a user profile with name input and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/services/BillCat: Clickable UI card representing a bill payment category with an icon and label.
frontend/src/config/betting.ts: Defines supported betting providers and preset amount chip values.
frontend/src/config/finance.ts: Provides conversion rate config and a function to compute gross, fee, and net amounts.
frontend/src/config/giftCardBrandCatalog: Catalog of gift card brands with names, search terms, icons, and helper filtering.
frontend/src/config/giftCardRatesNGN.ts: Defines NGN rate tables, brand overrides, and helpers for matching tiers and formatting rates.
frontend/src/config/nigerianBanks.ts: Exports a list of Nigerian banks and a search filter function.
frontend/src/config/vendors.ts: Lists payout vendors and selects the best one based on net payout calculation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Re-exports hook for fetching the caller's user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardData.ts: Aggregates profile, KYC, cards, withdrawals, and transactions into a unified dashboard dataset.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationPermis: Offers a hook to check browser notification support, read permission state, and request permission safely.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationSettin: Manages per‑principal notification preferences with localStorage persistence and a toggle API.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileSetupSuppre: Handles storing and retrieving per‑principal suppression flags for hiding the profile setup prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile and gift card operations, including backend mapping and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletSummary.ts: Fetches the caller’s user profile and returns primary wallet balance and currency.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, themes, and utility classes for the app.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions including class merging, currency formatting, and date formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminKycReviewP: Admin interface to search users, view their KYC records, and update KYC statuses.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Admin interface for reviewing and approving or rejecting pending withdrawal requests.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the dashboard with balance visibility toggle, shortcuts, and styled header using dashboard data.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/__tests__/a: Empty test file placeholder for NGN rate summary behavior.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/addGiftCard: Utility to compute the NGN rate tier for a given brand and amount string.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/AddGiftCard: Form to add a gift card with brand selection, currency, amount, code, optional image upload, and NGN rate tier computation.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardDet: Displays details for a single gift card, including status updates, labels, and NGN rate tables.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardsLi: Lists all gift cards with tag-based filtering and navigation to add or view cards.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/HottestCard: Ranks and displays gift cards by highest NGN rates with navigation to details or add page.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/hottestCard: Computes and sorts gift cards by their highest NGN rate using deterministic tie-breakers.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/SellGiftCar: Handles selling a gift card by computing rates, selecting vendors, and validating amount and card status.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays local transaction history, listens for new transactions, and shows a list or empty state with navigation.
frontend/src/pages/KycPage.tsx: Shows current KYC status and provides a form to submit identity documents with file upload and progress tracking.
Form page to purchase airtime by selecting a provider, entering phone and amount, and logging a local transaction.
Implements a betting top‑up form with provider selection, account ID, amount entry, and a review/confirm flow that logs a local transaction.
frontend/src/pages/services/BillsPage.ts: Shows a grid of bill‑payment categories and navigates to the corresponding service pages.
frontend/src/pages/services/CableTvBills: Provides a placeholder Cable TV payment form that logs a mock transaction for a smartcard number and amount.
frontend/src/pages/services/CryptoWallet: Displays a crypto wallet dashboard with mock token balances, quick action sheets, and activity sections.
frontend/src/pages/services/DataPage.tsx: Contains a placeholder mobile data purchase form that logs a mock transaction for a phone number and amount.
frontend/src/pages/services/ElectricityP: Offers a placeholder electricity bill payment form that logs a mock transaction for meter number and amount.
frontend/src/pages/services/WifiInternet: React page for submitting placeholder internet bill payments and logging them locally as pending transactions.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings for authentication info and notification preferences using Internet Identity and browser permissions.
frontend/src/pages/withdrawals/Withdrawa: UI for viewing withdrawal requests, adding payout methods, and submitting new withdrawal requests with currency selection.
frontend/src/state/localTransactions.ts: Manages local transaction storage in localStorage, allowing add, retrieve, and clear operations with auto‑generated IDs.
frontend/src/state/notificationSettingsS: Handles per‑principal notification settings using scoped localStorage keys for reading and writing flags.
frontend/src/types/app-types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for currencies, profiles, wallets, transactions, gift cards, KYC records, payouts, and withdrawals.
frontend/src/types/process-env.d.ts: Declares TypeScript types for frontend environment variables like II_URL and II_DERIVATION_ORIGIN.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, plugins, and container settings.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, environment variable injection, aliases, build chunking, dev server proxying, and dependency optimization.
project_state.json: Defines project state for adding full Nigerian bank support, listing existing features, a new request, and notes on updating withdrawal UI with a maintained bank list.
